WRITING.TITLE: When you open a youtube video in a new tab, immediately click to pause it but still starts anyway.

WRITING.TEXT:
Well let me clarify that I'm not a pyromaniac and my interest comes from my passion of experiencing new things/situations.
And a flamethrower is on my list besides fire breathing. It seems like a mighty feeling to ignite a giant flame with just a trigger. And the axes are a creative idea, we will propably not realise it but it seemed like a cool alternative.
I'll certainly do! If there are further questions I'll answer them all glady.

Haha thanks for checking up on me! I'm doing fine haven't burnt myself to death. As for the flamethrower, I still haven't found a place or someone who we can try it from but my buds also joint the hunt. If we can't find one anywhere we'll just have to make our own! I did come up with the idea of throwing axes with which we could light their head on fire. I guess you could technically still call that flamethrowing

WRITING.TITLE: Is there a list of decks for each scenario ?
WRITING.TEXT: If I'm not feeling like figuring out a deck, is there a place where I can find the best deck to play against a scenario ? Preferably for two players but I'll take anything!
or one out of the discard pile and one out of the encounter pile ?* instead of 'two out of each one ?'

WRITING.TITLE: "Goblins are Upon You!" Clarification question: Does each player search for one or two goblins ? One out of the discard or encounter pile or two out of each one ?
QQ: Does surge stack ?
WRITING.TEXT: When I draw a card with surge, I resolve it when revealed effect if any and then I draw another card. If that card also has surge does it also surges ?
I will find a way! (adventure music)

When a moderator pins something on a subreddit they often tag (?) it with '- announcement' For example:
The May Playlist Competition (self.spotify) geplaatst op 9 dagen geleden door chriski1971 [M] - announcement

WRITING.TITLE: How to subscribe to announcements of a subreddit?
WRITING.TEXT:
Title.
- Night mode: true - RES Version: 5.6.1 - Browser: Chrome - Browser Version: 58 - Cookies Enabled: true - Reddit beta: false

WRITING.TEXT: Yeah liked one on soundcloud and added one on spotify but doesn't seem to sync :(
I've configured both but they don't seem to work, when do these run?

WRITING.TITLE: Is there a program for syncing between multiple accounts?
WRITING.TEXT: Is there a program that automatically syncs your spotify library with your soundcloud likes ? For example: When I add song A to my spotify library it will automatically like song A on soundcloud? Is there a program that does this between multiple networks? Such as Spotify, Soundcloud, Facebook, Snapchat, etc. (Facebook as in liking the artist, snapchat as in following the official account. When I follow an artist on spotify) Currently I have to do it all manually but since my taste is quite eclectic it would really save me a lot of work.
Some more of his work here: [MORE GIANTS](http://www.boredpanda.com/giant-scrap-wood-sculptures-thomas-dambo/)
